sample.Controller

Class CharaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Controller.CharaController

  • public class CharaController
extends java.lang.Object
    Detect the different keyboard entrances. Note : for moving character, boolean are used and return to the mediator for allowed diagonal moves and forbid the player to overtake limits.
    Author:
    kevalente and phrougerie
